Query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `company` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `owner` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `slogan` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email1` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email2` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `landline1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `landline2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `website` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address_line1` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address_line2` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `city` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `state` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `country` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `zip` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `logo` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `company` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `gstin` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `logo`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `locations` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `lat` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `lang` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `managerid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `contact1` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `contact2` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `employees` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address` VARCHAR(1500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `password` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `uid` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `pan` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `doj` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `dob` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `locationid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `role` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `password`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `firstlogin` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `role`;ALTER TABLE `employees` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `profilepic` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT 'default.jpg' AFTER `firstlogin`;INSERT INTO `employees` (`name`,`email`,`mobile1`,`role`,`password`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Mayur Mhatre', 'mhatre975@gmail.com', '9768241151','Superadmin','d2cced938df2c0d42d5bfb1a785f76d9') AS tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM `employees` WHERE `email` = 'mhatre975@gmail.com' AND `mobile1` = '9768241151') LIMIT 1;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `manufacturers` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `manufacturers` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `createddate`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `categories` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `categories` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `createddate`;ALTER TABLE `categories` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `description` VARCHAR(1500) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `name`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `products` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`description` VARCHAR(2000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `catagoryid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `manufacturerid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `products` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `createddate`;ALTER TABLE `products` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `companyid`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `product_units` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `productid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `qty` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unit` VARCHAR(20) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mrp` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `sell_price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `product_units` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `createddate`;ALTER TABLE `product_units` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `companyid`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `product_images` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `filename` VARCHAR(500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unitid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `product_images` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `createddate`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `stock_point` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,  `address` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `contact1` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`contact2` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `stock_point` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `contact2`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vendors` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `owner` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `gstin` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `mobile2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email1` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `email2` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `landline1` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `landline2` VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `address` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `vendors` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `status`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `offers` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(200) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `catagoryids` VARCHAR(1500) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `productids` VARCHAR(1500) NULL DEFAULT NULL,`offer_image` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `offers` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `offer_prcnt` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `offer_image`;ALTER TABLE `offers` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `status`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `purchase_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `vendorid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `po_date` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `gross_amount` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `cgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `sgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `igst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_amount` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `purchase_master` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `companyid`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `purchase_details` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `po_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `product_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unit_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `qty` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unit` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `gr_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `po_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `gr_date` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `gross_amount` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `cgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `sgst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `igst` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_amount` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `gr_details` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `gr_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `product_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unit_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `gr_qty` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unit` VARCHAR(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `distrubution_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `location_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `distrubution_date` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_amount` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;ALTER TABLE `distrubution_master` ADD IF NOT EXISTS `status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `companyid`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `distrubution_details` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `distrubution_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `product_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `unit_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `qty` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `net_price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `megapack_master` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `description` VARCHAR(2500) NULL DEFAULT NULL ,`productids` VARCHAR(1000) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `pack_image` VARCHAR(120) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `selling_price` DOUBLE NULL DEFAULT NULL , `createddate` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , `createdby` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `companyid` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL , `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' , PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB;
